Two injured in BBQ eatery blast in eastern ChinaTwo people were injured on Saturday after a powerful blast at a barbecue shop in the eastern Chinese city of Huaian, local authorities said, the latest incident to spur calls for better restaurant-safety checks across the country. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 13:52:38 GMT EBBUZ7QO5FLPBKJ6RYDRPREWIY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/two-injured-bbq-eatery-blast-eastern-china-2024-03-16/Reuters世界中国
Second aid shipment for Gaza ready to sail from Cyprus, says its presidentA second cargo of food aid was ready to depart by sea from Cyprus to Gaza on Saturday, the island's president said, after a first aid shipment landed in the besieged Palestinian enclave overnight. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 13:27:37 GMT LROLFBJCS5LNLF27G7C7JJXFRY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/gaza-ready-to-sail-second-aid-shipment-cyprus-says-its-president-2024-03-16/Reuters世界中东地区
Mossad chief expected to resume Gaza ceasefire talks in Doha on SundayThe head of Israeli intelligence is expected to lead ceasefire talks with mediators which resume in Qatar on Sunday in direct response to a new proposal from Hamas, a source close to the talks told Reuters on Saturday. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 13:13:22 GMT KKBPKZ4TWVLJLDG6NQGECY2L2I https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/mossad-chief-expected-resume-gaza-ceasefire-talks-doha-sunday-2024-03-16/Reuters世界中东地区
Sixteen Nigerian soldiers killed in community clashes in Delta stateSixteen Nigerian Army soldiers were surrounded by youths and killed earlier this week after they attempted to quell community clashes in the oil-producing southern Delta state, an army spokesperson said on Saturday. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 12:29:07 GMT 272MD2CF4RLQ7IINEYRY44XRKU https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/sixteen-nigerian-soldiers-killed-in-community-clashes-delta-state-2024-03-16/Camillus Eboh世界非洲
Freed from jail, Senegal opposition presidential candidate draws hundreds to first eventA day after his release from jail, Senegal opposition leader Bassirou Diomaye Faye drew hundreds of supporters at his first public appearance as a presidential contender on Friday for March 24 elections, promising to tackle corruption. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 11:50:10 GMT VHJTXYAXPRMQHFKZF6WNMHD5CM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/freed-jail-senegal-opposition-presidential-candidate-draws-hundred-first-event-2024-03-16/Sofia Christensen, Bate Felix世界非洲
U.N. agency in Gaza says one in three children under 2 is acutely malnourishedOne in three children under age 2 in northern Gaza is now acutely malnourished and famine is looming, the main U.N. agency operating in the Palestinian enclave said on Saturday. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 11:46:57 GMT LEV2LFQY6VPC3H5RLOPQL23AVA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/un-agency-gaza-says-one-third-children-under-2-are-acutely-malnourished-2024-03-16/Reuters世界中东地区
India to hold world's largest elections between April and JuneNearly a billion people will be eligible to vote in India's general elections, to be held over almost seven weeks from April 19, where Prime Minister Narendra Modi will seek a record-equalling third straight term. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 11:11:37 GMT QDLUMDJT7JNONP7JZLM5LJ6TVU https://www.reuters.com/world/india/india-holds-worlds-largest-election- Between-april-june-2024-03-16/Reuters世界印度
India vote to start on April 19, Modi says confident of winIndia will elect a new parliament in seven phases between April 19 and early June, the country's election authority said on Saturday, in what amounts to the world's largest election with nearly one billion eligible to vote. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 10:27:43 GMT OQ77S2HBZ5M2ZAVNBGH5VUOYL4 https://www.reuters.com/world/india/india-begins-voting-april-19-worlds-largest-election-2024-03-16/Rajesh Prabhuswamy世界印度
Russian war exiles bring banyas and blinis to Buenos AiresWhen Ilia Gafarov and Nadia Gafarova host the grand opening of their "banya", a traditional Russian sauna, in April, they hope it will help make a permanent home of their adopted city of Buenos Aires. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 10:06:43 GMT UVLRWCKX7NOD5L6KG3MGPPIFGQ https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russian-war-exiles-bring-banyas-blinis-buenos-aires-2024-03-16/Lucinda Elliott, Miguel Lo Bianco世界
Ukraine attacks Russian city and refinery on second day of presidential electionVladimir Putin dominates Russia's political landscape and none of the other three candidates presents any credible challenge. His leading critics are in prison or have fled abroad, prompting the opposition to call the vote a sham. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 09:05:37 GMT OREE6NDWCFMPBN3EMORNMGMI7A https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-strikes- Russian-city-refinery-day-two-presidential-vote-2024-03-16/Reuters技术网络安全
Two killed in shelling of Russian border city Belgorod, governor saysTwo people were killed and three wounded in a Ukrainian missile strike on the Russian border city of Belgorod, the regional governor said on Saturday, as Russian citizens vote through Sunday in a three-day presidential election. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 08:53:45 GMT K6YMPO6AWRLJRGQHMZUVSRN4DY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/two-killed-shelling- Russian-border-city-belgorod-governor-says-2024-03-16/Reuters世界欧洲
